GStreamer Good Plugins 0.10 Plugins Reference Manual
Top  |  Description  |  Object Hierarchy

flacdec

flacdec — Decodes FLAC lossless audio streams

Synopsis




                    GstFlacDec;

Object Hierarchy


  GObject
   +----GstObject
         +----GstElement
               +----GstFlacDec

Description

flacdec decodes FLAC streams. FLAC is a Free Lossless Audio Codec.

Example launch line

gst-launch filesrc location=media/small/dark.441-16-s.flac ! flacdec ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! autoaudiosink

Another example launch line

gst-launch gnomevfssrc location=http://gstreamer.freedesktop.org/media/small/dark.441-16-s.flac ! flacdec ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! queue min-threshold-buffers=10 ! autoaudiosink

Element Information

plugin flac
author Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>
class Codec/Decoder/Audio

Element Pads

name sink
direction sink
presence always
details audio/x-flac
name src
direction source
presence always
details audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, width=(int){ 8, 16, 32 }, depth=(int){ 8, 12, 16, 20, 24, 32 }, rate=(int)[ 8000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 8 ]

Details

GstFlacDec

typedef struct _GstFlacDec GstFlacDec;
